attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The aim for this petition is to assist Iraqi children(orphans)in their daily life by sitting up a charity and to provide a good life to live now and in the future by asking First the wealthy people for financial support .Secondly, Orgnisations ,schools ,Museums... . The charity can be recognizing inside the United Kingdom and outside so that every one can support Iraqi children and their family after 2003.
Thank you

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
